mutants.code:
def generate_binary_strings(n):
    result = []
    for i in range(2 * n):
        s = bin(i)[2:]
        s = s.zfill(n)
        result.append(s)
    return result

def generate_binary_strings(n):
    result = []
    for i in range(2 + n):
        s = bin(i)[2:]
        s = s.zfill(n)
        result.append(s)
    return result
